column3: Security persons around the venue and CCTVs
Organizing chairs|tables|laptops|internet and electricity ports for both mentors and participants
Managing sponsors through PR with weekly communication on updates
Hearing a dedicated speech for Sponsor exposure
Arranging experienced mentors and speakers for sessions
Preparing presentation equipment such as projectors and screens
Ensuring availability of required software and tools
Planning activities to keep participants motivated during breaks
Distributing welcome kits with swag and hackathon guidelines
Setting up a support desk to address participant queries
